events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on January 9th, involving their vehicle being hit at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident details provided by the claimant.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to manage communication and claim processing with the customer.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and reassured the customer of timely assistance.
The agent requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driverâ€™s license copy.
The claimant submitted all required documents, including vehicle photos and the official police accident report as requested.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence along with contacting witnesses to gather more information on the collision event.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault and the damages claimed are valid and covered by the policy.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the costs of vehicle repairs and any related medical expenses from the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication during the claim process.
Approval was granted on the claim amount after customer accepted the proposed settlement terms without objections.
The settlement payment was processed and disbursed directly to the approved repair shop and medical providers.
After all payments were confirmed, the claim was officially closed with all parties notified of completion.
